# Next.js Dashboard Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
- **Framework**: Next.js with TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Purpose**: Business metrics dashboard
- **Deployment Target**: Vercel

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all code
- Follow Next.js App Router patterns
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Ensure responsive design for all screen sizes

## Project Status
- [x] Initial setup complete
- [ ] Metrics implementation pending
- [ ] Dashboard features to be added

## Notes
- Project configured for easy Vercel deployment
- Frontend and backend integrated in single Next.js app
